parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

put.description: Updates one or more PTR records associated with a Rackspace Cloud device.

post.description: Adds one or more PTR record records for a specified Cloud device.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Lists all PTR records configured for a specified Cloud device.

delete.description: Deletes one or all PTR records associated with a Rackspace Cloud device. Use the optional `ip` query parameter to specify a specified record to delete. Omitting this parameter Deletes all PTR records associated with a specified device.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Shows details for a specified PTR record associated with a specified Cloud device.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Shows assigned limits for a specified type.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Filters domains by domain name: list all domains manageable by the account specified that *exactly match* the value of the `name` parameter.

post.description: Creates a domain with the configuration defined by the request.

put.description: Updates the configurations of multiple domains.

delete.description: Deletes multiple domains and their subdomains from an account.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Shows details for a specified domain. Displays details, as specified by the `showRecords` and `showSubdomains` parameters.

put.description: Updates the configuration of a domain.

delete.description: Deletes a domain and its subdomains from an account.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Shows all changes to a specified domain `because` a specified `date/time`.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Exports details for a specified domain.

examples.application/json:
{
    "contentType": "BIND_9",
    "id": 2725339,
    "contents": "
    		example.net. 3600 IN SOA dns1.stabletransit.com.
			sample@rackspace.com. 1308874739 3600 3600 3600 3600
			example.net. 86400 IN A 110.11.12.16
			example.net. 3600 IN MX 5 mail2.example.net.
			www.example.net. 5400 IN CNAME example.net.
			example.net. 5600 IN NS dns1.stabletransit.com.
			example.net. 5600 IN NS dns2.stabletransit.com.			
		",
    "accountId": 1234
}

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Lists domains that are subdomains of the specified domain.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Searches all records for a specified domain for a specified type that match a specified `name` and/or `data`.

post.description: Adds one or more records to a specified domain.

put.description: Updates the configuration of records in the domain.

delete.description: Deletes multiple records from the domain.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Shows details for a specified record in a specified domain.

delete.description: Deletes a record from the domain.

put.description: Updates the configuration of a record in the domain.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

post.description: Imports a new domain with the configuration specified by the request.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Arbitrary character string generated by the authentication service in response to valid credentials.

get.description: Searches domains by domain name: lists all names manageable by the specified account that have the value of the `name` parameter as part of their name.
